scripts.prune:hard: npm run start-checks && rm -rf package-lock.json && npm run prune
scripts.common:build:watch: npm run start-checks && npm run build:watch -w packages/common
scripts.common:build: npm run start-checks && npm run build -w packages/common
scripts.planner:dev: npm run start-checks && npm run dev -w packages/planner
scripts.planner:build: npm run start-checks && npm run build -w packages/planner
scripts.planner:preview: npm run start-checks && npm run preview -w packages/planner
scripts.planner:strapi:migrate-project:build: npm run start-checks && npm run strapi:migrate-project:build -w packages/planner
scripts.landing:dev: npm run start-checks && npm run dev -w packages/landing
scripts.landing:ts:watch: npm run start-checks && npm run ts:watch -w packages/landing
scripts.landing:next: npm run start-checks && npm run next -w packages/landing
scripts.landing:build: npm run start-checks && npm run build -w packages/landing
scripts.landing:start: npm run start-checks && npm run start -w packages/landing
scripts.ui:dev: npm run start-checks && npm run dev -w packages/ui
scripts.ui:build:lib: npm run start-checks && npm run build:lib -w packages/ui
scripts.ui:build:previewPage: npm run start-checks && npm run build:previewPage -w packages/ui
scripts.ui:preview: npm run start-checks && npm run preview -w packages/ui
scripts.floor-plan-scanner:dev: npm run start-checks && npm run dev -w packages/floor-plan-scanner
scripts.floor-plan-scanner:build: npm run start-checks && npm run build -w packages/floor-plan-scanner
scripts.floor-plan-scanner:start: npm run start-checks && npm run start -w packages/floor-plan-scanner
scripts.start-checks: node helpers/start-checks.js && node helpers/check-package-versions.js && node helpers/create-eslint-rules-custom.js && node helpers/modify-node-modules/index.js --check
scripts.preinstall: node helpers/create-eslint-rules-custom.js && node helpers/modify-node-modules/index.js && npm run start-checks
scripts.prepare: node -e "try { require('husky').install(); } catch(e) { if(e.code !== 'MODULE_NOT_FOUND') throw e; }"
